| HistoryText             = According to [[Adomox (Earth-616)|Adomox]], a member of the [[Nova Corps (Earth-616)|Nova Corps]] who wanted more power for himself, he used a technology to illegally hack into the [[Glossary:Nova Force|Nova Force]] to gain access to the full power possible from his gang's helmets in order to augment his own strength for personal glory and gain. [[Jesse Alexander (Earth-616)|Jesse Alexander]] was sent by the Nova Corps undercover and won Adomox's trust by pretending to kill another Nova, which led to Adomox being arrested after many years of operating undercover. Adomox was later stripped of his ranks, and the Corps used his hack to create the Supernovas, a black ops unit within the Nova Corps that included Jesse.{{r|Nova Vol 5 20}}
